EXISTING STRUCTURES
###Iron chest at position(4.5, -58.5)

###Iron plate smelting at position(4.0, -60.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position (4.0, -60.0)

ERROR TIPS
###Crafting Iron Chests without enough Iron Plates
- The agent is repeatedly trying to craft iron chests but failing because it does not have enough iron plates. Ensure that there are enough iron plates before crafting iron chests.
- The agent is also running out of fuel for the furnace. Ensure that the furnace has enough fuel to smelt iron ore into iron plates.

NAMESPACE
